evidence: Last 30 days' net cashflow is -3 INR (Income 250, Expense 253)
counsel: Strive to keep your income higher than your expenses to build financial stability
fullText: - Cashflow Management: Last 30 days' net cashflow is -3 INR (Income 250, Expense 253). Counsel: Strive to keep your income higher than your expenses to build financial stability.

evidence: "Transfer" amounts to 252 INR, nearly all of your 253 INR total expenses
counsel: Understand the purpose of these transfers to determine their budget impact
fullText: - Expense Categorization: "Transfer" amounts to 252 INR, nearly all of your 253 INR total expenses. Counsel: Understand the purpose of these transfers to determine their budget impact.

evidence: One 100 INR "Transportation" transaction lacks an expense/income direction
counsel: Classify all transactions to accurately reflect your true spending and income
fullText: - Transaction Clarity: One 100 INR "Transportation" transaction lacks an expense/income direction. Counsel: Classify all transactions to accurately reflect your true spending and income.

evidence: Your savings rate for the last 30 days is -0.01
counsel: Focus on increasing income or reducing discretionary spending to achieve positive savings
fullText: - Savings Improvement: Your savings rate for the last 30 days is -0.01. Counsel: Focus on increasing income or reducing discretionary spending to achieve positive savings.

evidence: You have only 6 transactions recorded in the last 30 days
counsel: Ensure all financial activities are logged to get a full view of your money movements
fullText: - Comprehensive Tracking: You have only 6 transactions recorded in the last 30 days. Counsel: Ensure all financial activities are logged to get a full view of your money movements.

evidence: Total income (350 INR) is higher than last 30 days income (250 INR)
counsel: Consistent reporting of all income sources provides a clearer long-term financial picture
fullText: - Income Tracking: Total income (350 INR) is higher than last 30 days income (250 INR). Counsel: Consistent reporting of all income sources provides a clearer long-term financial picture.
